main event: Civilians reported a UFO sighting at Jones Beach, N.Y. on September 3, 1953.
interesting points: The observation was made during a very dark night with no visible stars,The reliability of the witnesses was noted as fair,The object appeared luminous silver and may have had windows,The sighting lasted approximately between 20 to 30 seconds with one object traveling east and another west,The report concluded that the sighting could have been a reflection from an automobile spotlight off a cloud bank.
sighted object: luminous silver object, possibly a dirigible
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. [REDACTED] with reliability rated as fair
